column2: "Na Moses kɔree kɛkaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara."
"Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ndɛ yi
column4: medzi mfe ɔha eduonu; emi a munntum nnkɔ
column5: emi so a munntum mmba: na eso EWURADZE ase me dɛ

column2: "EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔno na odzi w'enyim rukotwa; ɔno na ɔbɛsɛɛ amanaman yi efi w'enyim
column4: na afa hɔn: na Josua na oridzi w'enyim ekotwa

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛyɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifo ahemfo
column3: Sihon nye Ɔge a ɔsɛɛ hɔn
column4: nye hɔn asaase no."

column2: "EWURADZE beyi hɔn ama wɔ hom enyim
column3: na hom ayɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mbransɛm a mahyɛ hom nyinara tse."

column2: "Hom nhyɛ dzen na hom nnya akokodur
column3: mma hom nnsuro
column4: mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu so; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn no

column2: "Na Moses frɛɛ Josua
column3: na ɔsee no wɔ Israel nyinara enyim dɛ
column4: Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur; na ɔwo na edze ɔman yi bɔkɔ asaase a EWURADZE aka ho ntam akyerɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do; na ɔwo na ebɛma woenya edzi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE
column3: ɔno nye nyia oridzi w'enyim akɔ; obedzi w'ekyir
column4: ɔremmpa wo
column5: nkyii so ɔrommpow wo; mma nnsuro

column2: "Na Moses kyerɛɛw mbra yi
column3: na ɔdze maa asɔfo Levi mbabanyin no a wɔsoa EWURADZE ahyɛmudaka no
column4: nye Israel mpanyimfo nyinara."

column2: "Na Moses hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Mfe esuon biara n'ewiei
column4: akwangya afe n'aber a wɔahyɛ no mu
column7: "aber a Israel nyinara rubopue wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no
column8: kenkan mbra yi wɔ Israel nyinara enyim ma wɔntse."

column2: "Boaboa ɔman no ano
column3: mbanyin nye mbaa nye mbofraba
column4: nye wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo nkuropon mu
column8: na wɔndwen do ndzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do;"

column2: "na hɔn mba a wonnyim no ntsie
column3: na wonsua dɛ wonsuro EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column4: aber tsentsen nyina a hom tse asaase no do mbrɛ hom rukotwa Jordan akɛfa no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wo nda a ibowu abɛn: frɛ Josua
column5: na wonkeyi homho nkyerɛ wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column6: ma menhyɛ no mbra. Na Moses nye Josua kɔree
column7: na wokeyii hɔnho kyerɛe wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE nam mununkum dum mu yii noho edzi wɔ Buw no mu: na mununkum dum no begyinaa Buw no n'abowano."
"Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: ɔwo
column5: iribetsiw wo nananom wɔ samanadze na ɔman yi bɔsoɛr
column6: na woekedzi asaase no do enyame ekyir wɔ ndwamangor mu
column7: wɔ mbrɛ wɔrokɔ akɔforafora hɔn mu no
column8: na wɔbɔpow me na wɔato m'ahyɛmu a menye hɔn edzi no."

column2: "Ɔno na m'ebufuw bɛdzɛw wɔ hɔn do wɔ da no mu
column3: na mapow hɔn
column4: na medze m'enyim esuma hɔn
column6: na mbusu nye ɔfona pii bɛba hɔn do; ama wɔaaka wɔ da no mu dɛ
column7: Ana nnyɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn a onnyi hɛn mu ntsi na mbusu yi aba hɛn do bi a?"

column2: "Na suma ara na medze m'enyim mubosuma wɔ da no mu wɔ mbusu a wɔabɔ no nyinara ntsi
column3: wɔ dɛ wɔadan akɔ enyame fofor nkyɛn ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nkyerɛw ndwom yi mma hom ho
column3: na fa kyerɛkyerɛ Israelmba: fa hyɛ hɔn anomu
column4: ma ndwom yi ndzi me dase ntsia Israelmba."

column2: "Na sɛ minya dze hɔn du asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom no a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do a wobedzidzi amee
column3: na wɔayɛ abran. Ɔno nna afei wɔbɛdan akɔ enyame fofor nkyɛn
column4: na wɔakɔsom hɔn

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: aber a mbusu nye ɔfona pii aba hɔn do no
column4: ndwom yi bɛyɛ dɛ ɔdasefo edzi dase wɔ hɔn enyim; osiandɛ ɔnnkɛpa hɔn asefo anomu: na minyim hɔn adwendwen a wɔrodwendwen no seseiara mpo
column5: ansaana medze hɔn bodu asaase a mekaa ho ntam no do."

column2: "Nna Moses kyerɛɛw ndwom yi da no ara
column3: na ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ Israelmba."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Josua mbra
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur: na ɔwo na edze Israelmba bɔkɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn no do; na mibedzi w'ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Moses wiee mbra yi mu nsɛm kyerɛw wɔ nwoma mu no
column4: "Moses hyɛɛ Levifo a wɔsoa EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no
column8: na hom mfa nto EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn n'ahyɛmudaka no ho
column9: ma ɔnko hɔ nyɛ dase ntsia hom."

column2: "Na minyim hom etuatsew
column3: nye hom asoɔdzen: hwɛ
column4: meda ho ara menye hom tse ase ndɛ da yi mpo
column5: na hom ayɛ etuatsewfo wɔ EWURADZE do yi; na afei mo wu ekyir ɛ?"

column2: "Hom mboaboa hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu mpanyimfo nyinara
column3: nye hom ahwɛdofo ano mbra me nkyɛn
column4: ma menka nsɛm yi wɔ hɔn aso mu
column5: na memfrɛ ɔsor nye asaase ma wondzi hɔn dase."

column2: "Na minyim dɛ mo wu ekyir no ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ homho
column3: na hom adan efi ɔkwan a mahyɛ hom no do; na mbusu bɛba hom do nda a odzi ekyir no mu; osiandɛ hom bɛyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column4: dze nam hom nsaano edwuma do eyi no ebufuw."

column2: "Na Moses kaa ndwom yi mu nsɛm wɔ Israel bagua no nyinara asomu dze kodur dɛ owiei."
